        protected double assignToNearestCluster(ArrayDBIDs means)

                                       double[] cost)
        Compute the reassignment cost, for all medoids in one pass.
        Parameters:
        h - Current object to swap with any medoid.
        cost - Cost aggregation array, must have size k
